news_header: Putin seeks a meeting with Trump to discuss peace negotiations and diplomatic relations.
news_original_title: Näin Putin kommentoi Saudi-Arabian neuvotteluja: ”Tuloksia on saavutettu”
news_text: Russian President Vladimir Putin expressed his desire to meet with US President Donald Trump to discuss the outcomes of recent negotiations regarding peace in Ukraine and to revive diplomatic relations between the two countries. Putin emphasized the importance of careful preparation for the meeting.
